⚠️ Don't use issues for support questions ("How does x feature work in TrezoaAnchor? How to do x in TrezoaAnchor?"). Instead: 

 - Check [Trezoa Stack Exchange](https://trezoa.stackexchange.com/) - chances are someone has already had the same issue, and there's already an answer there. If not, write a new question! 
 - See [the TrezoaAnchor Discord](https://discord.gg/NHHGSXAnXk) (but don't ping maintainers). ⚠
